web_snippets: Rachel Simon is the author of the narrative nonfiction book Pickleball for All: Everything But the Kitchen Sink (Harper Collins/Dey Street Books).
Rachel Simon is the award-winning author of six books and a nationally-recognized public speaker on issues related to disability.
Born in 1959, Rachel Simon had a turmoil-filled childhood. She spent the end of her childhood and young adult years struggling with her parents' divorce and ...
